head.supplied: ¶ [From Baron F. Von Mueller, Melbourne, dated 15th July 1883. Requests to be furnished with two or three copies of the Indian edition of his 'Select Plants.' ¶ ]...

div.p: To an official of the Indian Government
British Library, India Office Records and Private Papers, proceedings, Agriculture and Horticulture: Agriculture, IOR/P/2055, pp. 77-8.

Letter not found. Item is a register entry only, recording receipt of the letter. There is an apparently similar request recorded in the registers of the Revenue and Agriculture Department, National Archives of India, New Delhi, but it does not have a precise date.
[From Baron F. Von Mueller, Melbourne, dated 15th July 1883. Requests to be furnished with two or three copies of the Indian edition of his 'Select Plants.'
B80.13.07. Three copies were provided, see an official of the Indian Government to M, 31 August 1883, and received, see M to an official of the Indian Government, 25 October 1883. ]
